article.title: Configuration of JPA Security
article.para: JPA Security is configured via the persistence properties in your persistence.xml. Below is a list of persistence properties that are supported out of the box by JPA Security.

listitem.para: net.sf.jpasecurity.maxFetchDepth - This property specifies up to which depth the object graph of secure entities shall be prefetched (that means, up to which depth secure entities are initialized as they come out of the entity manager). Secure entities that are not prefetched will be initialized on the fly (that means as they are retrieved by a property access of another secure entity). The default-value is 0.
